meanings.definition: A person who presents or introduces a program or event.
meanings.sent1: The presenters at the talent show welcomed each performer with a smile.
meanings.sent2: The presenters on the TV show shared interesting facts about animals.
meanings.sent3: The presenters at the party handed out prizes in colorful gift bags.
meanings.sent4: The presenters of the news delivered the information with clarity and professionalism.
meanings.sent5: The presenters at the conference captivated the audience with their engaging speeches.

meanings.definition: A device or software used to display information or media.
meanings.sent1: The new presenters in the conference room made it easier to share the presentation slides.
meanings.sent2: The digital presenters in the classroom helped the students follow along with the lesson.
meanings.sent3: The interactive presenters on the computer screen made learning fun for the kids.
meanings.sent4: The projector acted as a silent presenter, showcasing the images to the audience.
meanings.sent5: The electronic presenter displayed the video in high definition for everyone to see clearly.

meanings.definition: A person who gives a gift or award to someone else.
meanings.sent1: The generous presenters at the charity event handed out toys to the children.
meanings.sent2: The kind presenters at the ceremony congratulated the winners with trophies.
meanings.sent3: The surprise presenters at the party delighted everyone with unexpected gifts.
meanings.sent4: The anonymous presenter left a mysterious package on the doorstep.
meanings.sent5: The thoughtful presenters showered the guests with tokens of appreciation.
